Control.Name: BETA
Control.Tooltip: You are testing beta version of v2.27 update. The main focus of this update is the new grouping feature. Report all bugs/errors on issue tracker (support button in settings window).

Control.Name: LootLogs
Control.Tooltip: Open Loot Logs for selected entries.

Control.Name: Button1
Control.Tooltip: Credit players with attendance or remove attendance if showing raid roster.

Control.Name: Button2
Control.Tooltip: Set BaseGP values for selected players. Value will be taken from 'Input value' box used for EP/GP/DKP.

Control.Name: Title2
Control.Tooltip: Post message everytime players are awarded

Control.Text: This is beta update 2.0 , tested quite intensively and for sure less buggy than previous 1.7.5 version.There are stil a few things that need to be tested. PLEASE post on curse/PM me with bug reports if you encounter them. Client addon for raid members is in the works and right now I'm waiting for Carbine to fix API. With this update "RaidOps" (yup, I'm changing addon name) I have added some raid utilities that in my opinion may prove useful, if you want to have something else to be added let me know and I will implemnt your request. Main addon description will be rewritten with the release of version 2.0. Data for attendance and lootlist is pulled from Raid Summaries. That's all I wanted to say , enjoy :).
Control.Name: BIGPOPUP
HiddenColumns
Control.Tooltip: Some columns are hidden , resize to show them.

Control.Name: FilterAlert
Control.Tooltip: Player overriding filter is active. Click here to remove this filter.

Control.Name: QuickAddShortCut
Control.Tooltip: This TextBox is a shortcut to the value that can be set in settings.Press Enter to Submit

Control.Name: ButtonEP
Control.Tooltip: You can addit both EP and GP simultanouesly.

Control.Name: ButtonSettingsForceGuildCheck
Control.Tooltip: If item is Logged in Raid Summaries or Logs, ID field will be attached to this item's name.Depends on Bidding module.

Control.Name: ButtonSettingsCaseSensitivity
Control.Tooltip: WARNING! Enabling this will convert all existing names to lowercase and all new players added manually or automatically will have their names in lowercase.There's no comeback! After enabling just refresh the list.

Control.Name: LLonPopUp
Control.Text: Add Loot Log only after PopUp window.

Control.Name: ClrLogsAftWebsite
Control.Text: Clear all logs after website export.

Control.Name: Window1
Control.Tooltip: Before any kind of loot is registered it needs to go through this filter.

Control.Name: ButtonSettingsBidModule
Control.Tooltip: The efffect will take place after UI is reloaded.

Control.Name: ButtonSettingsHideStandby
Control.Text: Hide standby players from main roster.

Control.Name: TrackUndo
Control.Tooltip: This feature may slow things down.

Control.Name: ButtonShowStandby
Control.Tooltip: List of players that won't be affected by the Decay. Both DKP and EPGP.

Control.Name: ExportSettings
Control.Tooltip: Export settings only. They can be imported using 'Import Database' function in Import/Export window.

Control.Text: What do you want to do?
Control.Name: ActionTitle
LLogsFromExport
Control.Tooltip: Use Loot logs filtering for website export.

Control.Text: If you want to import data , and import string is longer than 30 000 characters you have to split it in 30k chars parts.You can use notepad++ for example. You can also try file import.
Control.Name: Window
ClearString
Control.Tooltip: Press this to clear created string.

Control.Name: AddString
Control.Tooltip: If export string is too big (more than 30k characters) , split it , paste those parts and press this buton to concat them. Text boxes are limited to approx 30k characters.

Control.Name: Button1
Control.Tooltip: Load export string from file. Instead of pasting chunks of text go to addon's install directory , you will find there "IMPORT_STRING_HERE.lua" file follow instructions inside , save and /reloadui. After that you can press this button to import whole string at once.

Control.Text: String may be too long for text box , if it's the case copy this string to your clipboard
Control.Name: Window1
ModeDisplay
Control.Tooltip: Exports data as it's displayed in main roster.

Control.Name: Button2
Control.Tooltip: Export and save data for uploader to retrieve.

Control.Name: ButtonForceClose
Control.Tooltip: Forces the PopUp to close and clears the queue of items.

Control.Name: ButtonSkip
Control.Tooltip: Skips an item and update the loot info accordingly.

Control.Name: Button
Control.Tooltip: Filter out gifts patterns and signs.

Control.Name: ButtonExport
Control.Tooltip: Export during raid session may not work properly as of now.

Control.Name: ExportTab
Control.Tooltip: If Checked exports only selected tab , exports whole raid otherwise.

Control.Text: Register items only through popup window?
Control.Name: Window2
Window4
Control.Tooltip: Specifies the time you have to log in again.If you log in after specified perioid Raid Session will be automaticaly submitted.

Control.Name: ButtonMassAdd
Control.Tooltip: Adds the specified DKP(options) to all RaidMembers.Adds Log to each player with RaidName.

Control.Text: Player who has spent the most DKP on one item:
Control.Name: Decription

Control.Text: Player who has acqiured most items:
Control.Name: Decription

Control.Text: Number of Killed Bosses in total:
Control.Name: Decription

Control.Text: Number of Killed Bosses in GA:
Control.Name: Decription

Control.Text: Number of Killed Bosses in DS:
Control.Name: Decription
ButtonUpdateStats
Control.Tooltip: Updates the statisctics.Note that it also keeps info about deleted raids.

Control.Name: Help
Control.Tooltip: Data Sharing allows players with RaidOps Member Module to fetch PR/DKP data of their fellow raid members.

Control.Name: Remove
Control.Tooltip: You are removing this player permamently!

Control.Text: Amount of players that will be imported with current filters:
Control.Name: Window3
Source
Control.Tooltip: EXACT player name you are goinf to fetch data from.Press ENTER to submit.

Control.Name: FetchOnlyInRaid
Control.Text: Attempt to fetch only while in raid.

Control.Name: FetchOnlyCombat
Control.Text: Fetch only while not in combat.
Time in minutes between fetch attempts:
Control.Name: TitlePeriod
SendOutOfCombat
Control.Text: Send data only while not in combat.

Control.Name: Window4
Control.Tooltip: Fetching data will request the player specified for his data , if successfull all your current data will be updated with the new one provided.

Control.Name: SmartEncoding
Control.Tooltip: Less data to process = less frezees , comes at cost of increased risk of freeze on first fetch from each requester and it takes up more space.

Control.Text: When grouping by day show items form last X days:
Control.Name: MaxDaysTitle

Control.Text: Provide item ID you wish to award:
Control.Name: TitleID
Button1
Control.Tooltip: Review all items that appeared in Master Loot window in current session , find appropriate and select it to automatically fill in ID value.

Control.Text: Amount of GP to be subtracted:
Control.Name: TitleGP
Choose
Control.Tooltip: Select an item from giver's item pool. Left Click to update selected item.

Control.Text: Amount of GP to be added:
Control.Name: TitleGP1

Control.Text: Allow your guild members to check current roster easily!
Control.Name: Window3

Control.Text: Questions ? Suggestions ? Bug reports? I'm checking this issue tracker every few hours so if you require some assistance write there.
Control.Name: Window2

Control.Text: If you happen to be forgetting about decay you can enable this reminder. It will display big message after each /reloadui and glow around decay button will be added.
Control.Name: Description

Control.Text: You can view next remind date by hovering mouse on the right from the button that opens this window.
Control.Name: Window4

Control.Text: Armory is presented on website (raidops.net) , data can be pulled during raid or imported manually by member. It includes items , runes and basic stats like moxie , grit etc. If you would like something else included , just tell me.
Control.Name: Window

Control.Text: Do not inspect other players during the scan.
Control.Name: Window1
Append
Control.Text: Append armory data in website export.

Control.Name: UpdateNow
Control.Tooltip: All group members in range will be scanned.

Control.Name: GetOwn
Control.Tooltip: All group members in range will be scanned.

Control.Name: Window5
Control.Tooltip: It takes 3 seconds per unit to scan , if unit is not in range when its turn comes then it won't be scanned.
